reviews.name: OP Men's Skate Sneaker
reviews.reviewText:
i am a bus driver for an assisted living facility . i am always getting on and off the bus , loading and unloading passengers and their belongings . i needed a shoe that was affordable , looks good with a no slip sole and most of all comfortable .

these shoes have it all for me . i bought the black ones first , then added the tan ones about a month later . i like them so much im ordering the grey ones today . i haven't had one complaint about these and the people i work with all comment one how great they look . they cant believe they are only 16 bucks ! plus i remember the OP brand from when i lived in SoCal as a kid . its still a great brand 30 years later .
reviews.title: wear them everyday

reviews.name: OP Men's Skate Sneaker
reviews.reviewText: Always remember...you get what you pay for. These shoes arrive in no shoe box, but wrapped in plastic. I removed plastic, put my foot in, pulled the shoe strings and one of the eyelets tore all the way through. Should I expect more from a $16 shoe...No, but it would have been nice to have been able to wear them at least once.
reviews.title: VERY Poor Quality

reviews.name: OP Men's Skate Sneaker
reviews.reviewText: I remember in the 80's that O.P. was a big name brand in surf culture.Not as big as they used to be(like other brand names Walmart now sells)but hey,the prices are way cheaper then they were in the 80's.I bought these shoes for my son who likes skater style shoes because of their rounded toe and the bottom soles have very good traction.With these style shoes you can tie them once and keep taking them on and off without having to re-tie them like my son does.The price was only $16 so if they last 7 months like the last pair did,buying two pairs a year saves me a lot of money than buying higher priced name brand shoes.My son is an out doors kid so he puts them to good use.When they start looking dingy,I simply throw them in the washing machine and they look good as new afterwards.
reviews.title: Ocean Pacific Is Still A Good Brand

reviews.name: OP Men's Skate Sneaker
reviews.reviewText: Sized right, comfortable, seems like they will hold up well. The grey material creases a bit around the toe area but it's not terrible. Excellent price and they look pretty good.
reviews.title: Excellent for the price

reviews.name: OP Men's Skate Sneaker
reviews.reviewText: I first purchased these shoes (in tan) from a Walmart store a few weeks ago. I was completely satisfied with them. However, the store didn't have my size in the gray/black style. So, I ordered two pairs of them from Walmart.com. I was completely satisfied with my shopping experience and with the product. The uppers and soles seem sturdy, and they're great for knock-around use (although they're not formal enough for work... at least for me). My only qualm is that they come with laces that are way too long. But of course that's easily remedied. 5 stars.
reviews.title: An excellent value !
